results.content:
Good course. It would be lot of work to permanentely update to actual WP and Bootstrap version, I can imagine.

I like this technical way of showing where things are and how to take them.

I find it very good to have first a static layout with WP only, then in second block, everything combined with Bootstrap in order to get responsive layout.

Thanks for this course, I like it.
